name: Instantly receive UTM links from Airtable and shorten the URLs using Bitly
description: UTM links are automatically created in your table and you can select the option to shorten the URL. Make instantly receives the links, shortens it using Bitly and returns the links back to the table. This template uses this [Airtable template.](https://airtable.com/shr7fDFzmjtu9LOZW/tblIuxUbinH9fl6ZA/viwj4wmjZ5UFH338D?blocks=hidexxx)
